TopicTitle: Can You Reload A Part In 0.20.2?

Articles.Content:
So I'm sure I saw a way of reloading a part after you made some changes but I can't seem to find it again.

Anyone know how to do this?
Open the debug menu with alt+f12. You'll find the reload option in there somewhere...
Its under the last tab. Click reload all.
Is this still possible in 0.24? If I can reload instead of restarting that would save me some time
